articles.author: Allison Hussey
articles.title: Lollapalooza 2021 Lineup Announced: Megan Thee Stallion, Tyler, the Creator, Foo Fighters, Post Malone, and More - Pitchfork
articles.description: The Chicago festival will return to Grant Park July 29 through August 1
articles.content: Lollapalooza has been confirmed to return to Chicago this summer. Its set for July 29 through August 1 at Grant Park. Today, the festival announced its full 2021 lineup, which features headliners Foo… [+2278 chars]
